summary: The Housing Our Military Effectively For Readiness, Operations, and Neutralization of Threats Act of 2025 (HOMEFRONT Act of 2025) aims to exempt certain military housing units from the requirements of the National Historic Preservation Act. It amends existing United States Code to clarify exemptions for military unaccompanied and family housing, and restricts the use of non-disclosure agreements in privatized military housing, applying this restriction retroactively.
